title: Coffee Idle
description: Coffee Idle is a casual clicker game where you start a small coffee business and transform it into a thriving hot spot, becoming the ultimate coffee mogul. Watch it flourish into a bustling empire as you upgrade your equipment and enhance your brewing techniques. Train your baristas to perfection while crafting a delightful menu of beverages, including frothy cappuccinos and rich Irish coffee. Maximize your profits by optimizing production speeds and expanding your customer base, ensuring that every cup is served with excellence. With strategic planning and a passion for coffee, you'll build a caffeinated kingdom that dominates the market.
